product_name: NYX Professional MakeupMatte Finish Long Lasting Makeup Setting Spray Vegan Formula
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackDiscover the best setting spray for makeup with NYX Professional Makeup Matte Makeup Setting Spray, the No. 1 Setting Spray in America*.
details: DetailsBenefitsMakeup setting spray with a matte shine-free finish to lock in your makeup look.Features a lightweight, no transfer, long-lasting formula that keeps makeup looking flawless with that "just-applied" look from day to night.Say goodbye to shine with this long lasting matte finishing setting spray enriched with Niacinamide, that works to reduce & combat shine, while leaving a silky-smooth, poreless complexion behind.Protect your perfectly-applied matte makeup with the best setting spray for oily skin.This sheer and smooth mattifying spray is the finishing touch to your beauty routine that you need to add to your makeup bag ASAP.Vegan setting spray formula* (no animal-derived ingredient or by-product).Cruelty free.*L'Oreal calculation based in part on data reported by NielsenIQ through its Scantrack Service for the Makeup Spray category for the 52-week period ending December 26, 2020, for the US xAOC market according to L'Oreal's custom product hierarchy. Copyright 2021, Nielsen Consumer LLC.Research ResultsProduct feels lightweight/weightless & comfortable to wear all dayProduct applies evenly & provides a flawless finish all dayMatte Setting Spray reduces excess shine throughout the day & provides a matte finish all dayThis setting spray can be used alone to control shinePerfects the look of foundation & extends foundation wear all dayMatte Setting Spray reduces makeup transfer & smudgingItem 2254931How To UseIt's as easy as 1-2-3... simply shake, spray and set! Hold the spray 8-10 inches away from face, close eyes and spray in downward motion 3 times to cover entire face. Let dry before heading out with your flawless complexion.Pro Tip: Spray on your foundation brush before smoothing in foundation for an even application.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Alcohol, VP/VA Copolymer, Propylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Niacinamide, Sodium Salicylate, Plantago Lanceolata Leaf Extract, Mahonia Aquifolium Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: It's as easy as 1-2-3... simply shake, spray and set! Hold the spray 8-10 inches away from face, close eyes and spray in downward motion 3 times to cover entire face. Let dry before heading out with your flawless complexion.Pro Tip: Spray on your foundation brush before smoothing in foundation for an even application.

reviews.headline: The Finish/ no line
reviews.comments: This product is one of the best.. It is not sticky at all on your face.. But I spray this on a cotton round so don't get this in my eyes..

reviews.headline: I will purchase again.
reviews.comments: Great item, works really good !

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I love how this spray keeps my makeup looking matte and finish looking all day.

reviews.headline: Nyx Finishing setting Spray
reviews.comments: It was decent for the price, but it still would rub off a little, wasn't a complete matte finish, my skin did start to break out worse while using the Nyx powder foundation and setting spray.

reviews.headline: keeps my makeup on all day in a hot kitchen
reviews.comments: love this setting spray, never fails. keeps my makeup looking great even in a hot kitchen hovering over a steam table.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments:
By far a very superior product!
I've bought many makeup sealers and they haven't worked as well as this product.
My makeup lasted over 6 hours with this long lasting setting spray.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: This setting spray keeps my makeup on my face for a long period of time!

reviews.headline: My staple setting spray
reviews.comments: A very generous spray and keeps my makeup in place!

reviews.headline: Meh.
reviews.comments: Basic. Yes, gives it a setting but ny makeup onky lasted 8hrs with this when I normally use urban decay or skindinavia it lasts way longer- so when on of my other bottles is low ill just dump this in there to stretch g the expensive stuff.

reviews.headline: Absolute crap
reviews.comments: It sucks. Doesn't do anything at all. I just started spraying it into my back eye shadow to make a brow pomade. Only thing it's good for lol. It doesn't hold makeup at all and it's horrible on oily pores

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: I have tried multiple setting sprays and had little luck with preventing my makeup from rubbing off my skin onto my clothing. This NYX setting sprays beats all the expensive and inexpensive brands. I no longer have to worry that I will have a brown stain on my collars. I can wear my white coat and sweaters without constantly looking into mirrors to check for rub off stains. Yay for NYX!

reviews.headline: The Only Finish
reviews.comments: This works very well.. But put some in my hands only I do not want to spray into eyes (by Chance) so not a thing happens..

reviews.headline: This is the best setting spray
reviews.comments: This is totally worth the price because it blends your makeup perfectly. If you add to much however it can make your makeuo look sort of cakey.

reviews.headline: This is the best setting spray
reviews.comments: This is totally worth the price because it blends your makeup perfectly. If you add to much however it can make your makeuo look sort of cakey.

reviews.headline: Would Buy Again And Again
reviews.comments: I have tried this setting powder and the Milani one both of which give a very different finish. This setting spray does give a slightly dewy finish and helps make my makeup last all day if I spray it before and after application. The spray nozzle itself is not to strong and not to light. There is no strong scent which is great for my sensitive skin. I would repurchase again and again especially for the price!

reviews.headline: Matte setting spray that lasts all day
reviews.comments: I use this at work and been using it since 2018!

reviews.headline: Actually keeps oil away
reviews.comments: Great affordable price and it actually keeps the oil away! Works better then the all nighter, in my opinion. Does exactly what it needs to do.

reviews.headline: not good
reviews.comments: this is basically just waterâ€¦ if you want your makeup to stay all day this is not it. only buy this if you want it for in between makeup steps

reviews.headline: not good
reviews.comments: this is basically just waterâ€¦ if you want your makeup to stay all day this is not it. only buy this if you want it for in between makeup steps

reviews.headline: GET THISS
reviews.comments: yes!!! i always end the day with greasy skin even with setting powders. i spray this onto my face in the morning and finish with a pressed powder and it leaves an airbushed finish that lasts me the ENTIRE DAY. will be using this forever

faceoff_positive.comments: This is the first (DEWY) setting spray I've ever tried so I wasn't sure what to expect. I wear makeup because 1) I love it and 2) I have bad acne scarring and don't feel confident without covering it up. With that said I like my makeup to look natural--like I'm wearing some but not overly made up or cakey or plastic. With the exception of my oily nose my skin looks/feels neither oily or dry so I like to look smooth, soft with just the right sheen after makeup. This setting spray is what I have been missing in my makeup routine! I keep mine in the fridge because the coolness is so refreshing and keeps my pores nice and tight. It leaves your skin with a nice subtle glow and I have noticed a true difference in the staying power of my makeup. I don't wear anything on my nose because I constantly blow it all day, and sometimes I would see foundation wearing off in that area. With this spray it has definitely lessened! Hardly any wearing off at all. I don't like to be matte so I haven't tried that one but if it works as well as the dewy finish its a good buy.
faceoff_positive.headline: Dewy Finish, Worth It

faceoff_negative.comments: Not the best setting spray I have used, but not the worst. For the price you cant beat it. Will last thru your work day, but dont go out clubbing before re-applying.
faceoff_negative.headline: Its ok
